## EIP Pathway

The EIP pathway submodel will be validated against three data sources:
- Monthly Waiting Time Statistics, from the Mental Health Monthly Statistics published by NHS England
- Rates of component receipt at the NCAP date at the service level
- Aggregate waiting times, timing and rate of component receipt from the EXTEND dataset

Input data required for validation at the service level
